CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: Russian/Latino HDCAMs thx

Audio: Sweet Line Big Thx to Cadance


Notes:

Got this great cam, quality was very nice.
Didnt have any flicker, no movements, all bright,nightscenes are good,and no heads in the view
Another perfect release, best possible Video and best possible Line combined for this blockbuster.
One good release is the way to go, patience
thx for everyone involved


Encode:

Fixed brightness,contrast,rgb and added sharpness.
noticed 3 scenes were missing so i took the spots from the latino version and inserted them when needed
took me 3 more hours but Video is now complete.

Audio was a nice line, sounds perfect,lipsynced it to my video


wont get better than this till retail
enjoy

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: Line AC3 2.0 Stereo
Sample: yes included
